biotools.summary: A Python program (easer.py) based in PyCogent library for the homology-based retrieval of several sequence data types from Ensembl. A Perl program (enamer.pl) for the identification of sequence descriptions.

bioschemas.name: EASER
bioschemas.summary: A Python program (easer.py) based in PyCogent library for the homology-based retrieval of several sequence data types from Ensembl. A Perl program (enamer.pl) for the identification of sequence descriptions.
